OverviewÂ¶

Provide a consistent method to determine the device id used by applications such as bhp_identifier.

usage:
>>> device = Device()
>>> device.device_id
>>> 31

Device device_id is set with the current device id. It can determine the device_id from the settings.py, using the socket method socket.gethostname() along with the settings attribute HOSTNAME_PREFIX, or via the bhp_variables model values.

bhp_device
